Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: you should disable taht if you wantyour testnet node to work.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: its important to manage utxos perfectly to maintain a top node.

Content: @newvulcan if you search through this channel, you’ll find posts about utxo management
